attributes.action: provide tax relief on income to the sum of the annual council tax bill
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We already pay tax on our wages before we pay our ever increasing Council tax bill. The Council tax has risen above the rate of inflation and the average peoples pay rises. Can we afford to be taxed twice on the same income ??? Help us law abiding citizens to stay law abiding by helping us to pay our taxes !!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
